00042 
00043 struct b3GpuConstraintInfo2 
00044 {
00045         // integrator parameters: frames per second (1/stepsize), default error
00046         // reduction parameter (0..1).
00047         b3Scalar fps,erp;
00048 
00049         // for the first and second body, pointers to two (linear and angular)
00050         // n*3 jacobian sub matrices, stored by rows. these matrices will have
00051         // been initialized to 0 on entry. if the second body is zero then the
00052         // J2xx pointers may be 0.
00053         b3Scalar *m_J1linearAxis,*m_J1angularAxis,*m_J2linearAxis,*m_J2angularAxis;
00054 
00055         // elements to jump from one row to the next in J's
00056         int rowskip;
00057 
00058         // right hand sides of the equation J*v = c + cfm * lambda. cfm is the
00059         // "constraint force mixing" vector. c is set to zero on entry, cfm is
00060         // set to a constant value (typically very small or zero) value on entry.
00061         b3Scalar *m_constraintError,*cfm;
00062 
00063         // lo and hi limits for variables (set to -/+ infinity on entry).
00064         b3Scalar *m_lowerLimit,*m_upperLimit;
00065 
00066         // findex vector for variables. see the LCP solver interface for a
00067         // description of what this does. this is set to -1 on entry.
00068         // note that the returned indexes are relative to the first index of
00069         // the constraint.
00070         int *findex;
00071         // number of solver iterations
00072         int m_numIterations;
00073 
00074         //damping of the velocity
00075         b3Scalar        m_damping;
00076 };
00077 
00078 
00079 B3_ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(struct) b3GpuGenericConstraint
00080 {
00081         int                             m_constraintType;
00082         int                             m_rbA;
00083         int                             m_rbB;
00084         float                   m_breakingImpulseThreshold;
00085 
00086         b3Vector3 m_pivotInA;
00087         b3Vector3 m_pivotInB;
00088         b3Quaternion m_relTargetAB;
00089 
00090         int     m_flags;
00091         int m_uid;
00092         int m_padding[2];
00093 
00094         int     getRigidBodyA() const
00095         {
00096                 return m_rbA;
00097         }
00098         int     getRigidBodyB() const
00099         {
00100                 return m_rbB;
00101         }
00102 
00103         const b3Vector3& getPivotInA() const
00104         {
00105                 return m_pivotInA;
00106         }
00107 
00108         const b3Vector3& getPivotInB() const
00109         {
00110                 return m_pivotInB;
00111         }
00112 
00113         int isEnabled() const
00114         {
00115                 return m_flags & B3_CONSTRAINT_FLAG_ENABLED;
00116         }
00117 
00118         float getBreakingImpulseThreshold() const
00119         {
00120                 return m_breakingImpulseThreshold;
00121         }
00122 
00124         void getInfo1 (unsigned int* info,const b3RigidBodyData* bodies);
00125 
00127         void getInfo2 (b3GpuConstraintInfo2* info,  const b3RigidBodyData* bodies);
00128 
00129 
00130 };
